channel.title: plumber on Data Science in Education
channel.description: Recent content in plumber on Data Science in Education

item.title: The Power of Parameterized Reports With Plumber
item.description: Hello! It’s been… a while, to say the least. But I wanted to share a new thing I’ve been working on. Specifically, I’ve finally started to move more toward the “R in production” model, and I wanted to share how freaking fantastically awesome the combination of parameterized reports in R Markdown with plumber can be. TL;DR I created the report below using pagedown with some (rather a lot) of custom CSS.
